articles.title: Chasing hope, losing Omar: Five weeks with pancreatic cancer - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: In a clinic that offered hope for cancer patients who had been told there was none, I learned to face loss.
articles.content:
One month after diagnosis
Like floating embers, her words drifted through the doorway.
Sorry, do you mind helping me?
Although barely a whisper, they stopped me mid-stride.

articles.title: Chemical found in popular candy suppresses 'silent killer' pancreatic cancer, study indicates - Daily Mail
articles.description: The compound ISL, found in black licorice could slow the growth of pancreatic cancer cells and make certain chemotherapies more effective, a study from Hong Kong researchers suggests.
articles.content:
A chemical found in black licorice could help fight one of the world's deadliest cancers, a first-of-its-kind study suggests.
A study on mice found the flavonoid isoliquiritigenin (ISL), which is in… [+3321 chars]
